title: Schooled
description: Blakeley had the perfect summer planned out with her best friend, but when family issues take priority she is forced to take a summer job that her brother set up at a football camp he would be working at. Tyler Watts is itching to escape his reality. He needs a release and he needs it fast. A chance meeting in a bar (that Blake shouldn't have been at in the first place) changes both of their lives drastically. They're thrust into a forbidden romance that is made for the books!
author: Karsyn Parke
